author: larry
post: Ron, in all of your research, did you ever consider that a sick, bleeding Jesus asking for something to eat wouldn’t inspire belief in a resurrection? The disciples would have tried to get a doctor for Jesus, they wouldn’t have proclaimed Him risen from the dead. Unless, in your research, you also found evidence of magical healing potions that can restore good health to a man who was beaten to a bloody pulp, had nails hammered into His hands and feet, and received a spear wound in His side..
title: Oy vey!  We’ve got a problem?
